altername_name: Time Bokan Series: Bokan Densetsu: Butamo Odaterya Doronbou
name: Time Bokan Series: Bokan Densetsu: Buta mo Odaterya Doronboo
overview: Popular animation Time Bokan Series aired in the 50s. Three of the bad trio who have consistently worked as villains are back! PlayStation has released two Time Bokan Series games as shooters so far, but this time RPG is the name of the game. RPG makes it possible to enjoy the new story in the nostalgic atmosphere of all seven TV series. In this game, three characters (Dronjo, Tonsler and Boyakki) appear in the most popular work Yatterman in the Time Bokan Series. Doronjo and others will continue to travel while collecting the funds at Inchiki Commerce to create bad mechanics and fighting with good mechanics in order to execute the orders received from the god of thieves, Dokurobei.
